mapper.insert: insert into trace (te_id, te_fy_id, te_u_id, te_fy_creationtime, te_last_second) values (#{te_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{te_fy_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{te_u_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{te_fy_creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{te_last_second,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select te_id, te_fy_id, te_u_id, te_fy_creationtime, te_last_second from trace
